# Function: clearCache()

> **clearCache**(`companyNumber?`): `Promise`\<`void`\>

Defined in: [lib/companies-house/cache.ts:105](https://github.com/JoeInnsp23/practice-hub/blob/55bd3b546d1b7512932ac05d86981f2c5cc8e1c7/lib/companies-house/cache.ts#L105)

Clear cache entries

## Parameters

### companyNumber?

`string`

Optional company number to clear specific entry.
                       If not provided, clears all cache entries.

## Returns

`Promise`\<`void`\>
